transcript: I stayed tight for a very long time my wife and I we started spending money the year after the 17 million in profit and when I say spending money I mean increasing our living expenses to maybe I don't know 40 Grand a month and that may sound like a lot but we were taking home 1 and a half million a month you know by percentage it wasn't a huge amount and that was because I talked to some wealthier friends who are like you can chill you know like you can get double meet at Chipotle if you want to you know you can get guac
